data.text: @reevesyk1 Hello Kevin, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.

@USAisHome Hello JD, we apologise for all the distress caused by this situation. In order to verify the information, can you please inform us your bookings reference or the ticket number? For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you send it by private message. Thank you.

@ClaudiaBethell Claudia, thank you for the information. We have verified that you have contacted us via Facebook with the files and that we have already replied to your message. To avoid loss of information, we kindly request you to keep the communication via only one channel. Thank you.

para que possamos verificar o estado do seu processo, pedimos por favor, que nos confirme o número do mesmo e o email que lhe está associado. Por razões de confidencialidade, sugerimos que nos indique os dados por mensagem privada. Obrigado.

data.text: @Sofiapribeiromd Olá Sofia, lamentamos imenso a situação descrita e todos os constrangimentos causados. Prestar um serviço de excelência foi, é, e sempre será o lema da TAP. Disponha se necessitar de ajuda adicional. Obrigado.
@Wouter46829339 Hello Wouter, we apologize for the situation and that our services did not meet your expectations. In case we can be of assistance, please let us know. Thank you.

@BelaSchlup Olá Isabela, lamentamos imenso a situação e que no nosso serviço não tenha ido ao encontro das suas expetativas. Caso possamos prestar assistência, não hesite em contactar. Obrigado.

@eleanorcos Hello Eleanor,
in order to verify, please provide us the booking reference and the e-ticket number. For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message. Thank you.

@FreddyBGomis @pepperbern Hello Freddy, we apologize for the late resolution of your file. We assure you that the situation is being verified and that you will be contacted, via email, as soon as possible. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you.

@carlita04bg Hola Carla,
Entendemos su insatisfacción y le pedimos disculpas por cualquier inconveniente.
Quedamos a su disposición para cualquier información que necesite.
Gracias
@katiewinsIet For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you send it by private message. Thank you in advance. 2/2

@AliceDyntravel Hello Alice, in order to verify the situation, please provide us with your booking reference. For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.

data.text: @GustavoSimioni4 Olá Gustavo, de forma a verificar o estado do reembolso do serviço de transporte de animais, pedimos que nos indique o código da sua reserva ou o número de confirmação do serviço. Por razões de segurança, solicitamos que nos envie a informação por mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@AireNomada For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you send it by private message. Thank you. 2/2

@AireNomada Hello AireNomada, please accept our apologies for the distress caused by this situation. In order to verify, can you inform us your lost luggage file number (PIR), bag tag and booking reference related so we may verify? 1/2

@KevinRagan12 Hello Kevin, we apologize for the late resolution of your file. We inform you that it is being analysed. We assure you that you will be contacted, via email, as soon as the analysis of the situation is completed. Let us know if we can be of of further assistance. Thank you.

@Arti43310562 Hello Arti, we apaologise for the distress caused by this situation. In order to verify the information, can you please inform us your bookings reference or the ticket number? For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you send it by private message. Thank you.
@wickedgeekie Hello Sophie, we apologise for the distress caused by this situation. Can we assist you through this channel, please? Thank you.
@Missau121 Hello Verónica, we have replied by private message, Thank you.
@L4GAN Hello Sharon, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@SofiaS34 Hello Sofia, we replied by private message. Thank you.
@lynnziemm Hello Lynnzie, we have replied by private message. Thank you.

@janewakefield Hello Jane,
We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the described situation. Please let us know if you need any assistance. Thank you

@SofiaS34 Hello Sofia,
We inform you that we have already replied to your private messages. Thank you

@DebbyMiscow Olá Debora,
O check-in ficará disponível apenas a partir das 36h antes do voo. Pedimos que tente novamente mais tarde. Obrigada
@pepperbern We hope to see you again soon and provide you with a more positive experience. Feel free to contact us, if any further help is required. Thank you in advance

@pepperbern Hi! We deeply regret the situation reported. Your feedback is important and will allow us to have some insight as to where we can improve with our services in the future and exceed our customer's needs and expectations.
@madeg1957 Hola! Si es posible, por favor envíenos un mensaje directo con el tipo de asistencia necesaria y los datos de la reserva. Gracias.
@LavrikDaria Although we understand your urgency, we cannot precise a timeframe for the completion of your case. We kindly request that you await our feedback via email. Thank you
@EduMoreiraz Olá! Respondemos através de mensagem direta. Obrigada.
@SlimGYThang Hi! We deeply regret the delay if your bag. To better assist you, please DM us your lost luggage claim number. Thank you in advance

@LavrikDaria Hi! We deeply regret the situation described. Your complaint is still under review. Once the analysis is completed, you will be contacted by email. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance

@diegojatem @agent_k_from_b @IATA Hi! As already informed, your case is under review. You will receive new feedback via email as soon as possible. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.

data.text:
@seeba83 Hello Sebastian,
We sincerely apologize for the late reply.
Your complaint is under analysis and it will be completed as soon as possible. 
We appreciate your understanding.

@LidiaSantos Olá Lidia,
Poderá por favor indicar-nos o seu código de reserva ou o seu número de bilhete via DM para verificarmos a sua questão?

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text: @mcmahon_orlaith Hi! We deeply regret the situation reported. For compensation purposes, we kindly request that you submit the following form available on our website, using the following link - https://t.co/bwFSKNcRTz. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you

@dkotscho2 Hello Diogo, 
In order to assist you, please provide us the booking reference and/or the ticket number.  
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.

@yperse Hello Hedie,
We answered per DM.
@la_taupe123 @TAP_Portugal Bonjour! Une réponse vous a été apportée en message direct. Merci d'avance.
@kevin_tagne It means Property Irregularity Report. In this case, we need your lost luggage claim number. Thank you.

@kevin_tagne @kevin_tagne Hello Kevin, we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Can you provide us with your PIR? 
For security reasons we suggest that you send it by direct message. Thank you.

@EduMoreiraz @edumoreiraz Olá, pedimos que nos indique o código o seu código de reserva. Por motivos de confidencialidade sugerimos o envio por mensagem direta.  
Obrigado.

@cleopatralc @cleopatralc Hola Patricia, 
Hemos respondido a su mensaje privado. Gracias.

@MattEJackson @mattejackson Hello Matt, we are sorry for any constraint. If we can help with some question through this channel, we ask you to provide us with your booking code/reference number. 
For security reasons we suggest to send it by direct message. Thank you.

@Danrm84 @danrm84 Hello Daniel, can you provide us with your booking code?
For security reasons we suggest to send it by direct message. Thank you.

@AndyGaby90 @andygaby90 Hello Andy, we replied by direct message. 
Thank you.

@Crasskitty @united Hello Crass, we regret the described situation.
If assistance is needed, please send us your luggage irregularity report number (PIR) and booking reference or e-ticket number by private message. Thank you.
